name: test_e2e_with_logs[837_HPP_WAF_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HPP_WAF_001` |
| **Name** | HPP WAF bypass + admin escalation |
| **Category** | HPP |
| **Subcategory** | waf_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&admin=true&role=user&id=1 OR 1=1`
- **Encoded**: `%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Duser%26id%3D1%20OR%201%3D1`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
